faculties_accepted: Please refer to the Schools & Departments at Nanjing University for details
module_restrictions: Limited English-taught modules, subject to change

visa_duration.X2 visa: study period of no more than 180 days
visa_duration.X1 visa: study period of more than 180 days

visa_info.visa_application_center: China Visa Application Service Centre in Singapore
visa_info.visa_application_form: Admission letter and visa application form (JW202)

cost_of_living.breakdown: Subject to country and local conditions at the overseas Partner University

university_description: Nanjing University is a public research university located in Nanjing, China. It is one of China's oldest and most prestigious institutions of higher learning.
university_address: 22 Hankou Road, Gulou District, Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, PR China
location_description: Nanjing is the capital of Jiangsu province in eastern China. The city has a rich cultural history and is known for its beautiful temples, gardens and museums.
